text: I think I am strugglinh a little bit with Requires.jl. If anybody has a moment to take a look <https://github.com/JuliaManifolds/Manopt.jl/pull/53/commits/6d47f8a09c7cc23a7d06f268358f191713256199> – line 125, the println is never printed independent of how and when I load Manopt and Manifolds. This commit otherwise would nicely decouple (finally!) Manifolds and Manopt
